Altitude.card_desc: [Armor] Restore {scale=20|20}% of your maximum Booster fuel after getting a Killing Blow or Elimination.

Bask.card_desc: [Salvo] Heal for {scale=25|25} for each enemy hit by your Salvo rockets.

Combustible.card_desc: [Fire Spit] Fire Spit applies a Knockback and deals an additional 300 damage over 2s.

Condescension.card_desc: [Fire Spit] Reduce the Cooldown of Thrust by {scale=1|1}s for each enemy Champion hit with Fire Spit.

Decimate.card_desc: [Salvo] Increase the explosion radius of Salvo by {scale=15|15}%.

Follow the Scent.card_desc: [Fire Spit] Increase the size of your Fire Spit by {scale=20|20}%.

Fuel Tank.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your Booster fuel capacity by {scale=10|10}%.

Fusillade.card_desc: [Weapon] Damage dealt when hitting an enemy directly with Rocket Launcher or Salvo is increased by 25%.

Hot Swap.card_desc: [Weapon] Increase your Reload Speed by {scale=10|10}% for 3s after hitting an enemy with your weapon.

Hyper Boost.card_desc: [Salvo] Restore {scale=3|3}% of your Booster fuel each time Salvo hits an enemy.

Lung Capacity.card_desc: [Fire Spit] Heal for {scale=50|50} for each enemy Champion hit with Fire Spit.

Masterful.card_desc: [Fire Spit] Reduce the Cooldown of Fire Spit by {scale=0.5|0.5}s for each enemy Champion hit by it.

Propel.card_desc: [Thrust] Increase the forward distance of Thrust by {scale=25|25}%.

Rain of Fire.card_desc: [Thrust] Consume {scale=10|10}% less Booster fuel for 5s after using Thrust.

Spitfire.card_desc: [Salvo] Reduce the Cooldown of Salvo by {scale=0.25|0.25}s each time Salvo hits an  enemy with its rockets.

Survival.card_desc: [Thrust] Reduce the Cooldown of Thrust by 100% after dropping to or below {scale=10|10}% Health.

Thrill of the Hunt.card_desc: [Thrust] Reduce the Cooldown of Thrust by {scale=15|15}% when you get a Killing Blow.

W.Y.R.M. Jets.card_desc: [Booster] Increase your Movement Speed while using your Booster.

Antreiben.card_desc: [Düsenantrieb] Erhöht die Vorwärtsbewegung durch Düsenantrieb um {scale=25|25}%.

Dezimieren.card_desc: [Salve] Erhöht den Explosionsradius von Salve um {scale=15|15}%.

Entflammbar.card_desc: [Feuerspucke] Feuerspucke stößt Gegner zurück und fügt Zielen über 2s 300 Bonusschaden zu.

Feuerregen.card_desc: [Düsenantrieb] Nach Verwendung von Düsenantrieb verbraucht der Raketenrucksack 5s lang {scale=10|10}% weniger Treibstoff.

Hitzkopf.card_desc: [Salve] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Salve um {scale=0.25|0.25}s pro Treffer.

Hyperschub.card_desc: [Salve] Jedes Mal, wenn Salve ein Ziel trifft, wird {scale=3|3}% Raketenrucksack-Treibstoff erzeugt.

Jagdfieber.card_desc: [Düsenantrieb] Todesstöße reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Düsenantrieb um {scale=15|15}%.

Kraft sammeln.card_desc: [Salve] Für jeden mit Salve getroffenen Gegner wirst du {scale=25|25} LP geheilt.

Lungenkapazit\u00e4t.card_desc: [Feuerspucke] Für jeden mit Feuerspucke getroffenen Gegner wirst du {scale=50|50} LP geheilt.

Meisterung.card_desc: [Feuerspucke] Reduziert Abklingzeit von Feuerspucke für jeden damit getroffenen gegnerischen Champion um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Schnellwechsel.card_desc: [Waffe] Waffentreffer erhöhen dein Nachladetempo 3s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Schussfeuer.card_desc: [Waffe] Erhöht den Schaden durch direkte Treffer mit Raketenwerfer oder Salve um 25%.

Spitzenpr\u00e4dator.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Treibstofftank.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht die Treibstoffkapazität des Raketenrucksacks um {scale=10|10}%.

\u00dcberleben.card_desc: [Düsenantrieb] Fällst du auf oder unter {scale=10|10}% deiner maximalen Gesundheit, wird die Abklingzeit von Düsenantrieb um 100% reduziert.

Verachtung.card_desc: [Feuerspucke] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Düsenantrieb pro mit Feuerspucke getroffenem gegnerischem Champion um {scale=1|1}s.

W.Y.R.M.-D\u00fcsen.card_desc: [Raketenrucksack] Erhöht dein Flugtempo, während du den Raketenrucksack verwendest.

\u00c0 la trace.card_desc: [Crachat de feu] Le projectile de Crachat de feu est {scale=20|20}% plus volumineux.

Altitude.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque élimination vous redonne {scale=20|20}% de carburant.

Capacit\u00e9 pulmonaire.card_desc: [Crachat de feu] Vous regagnez {scale=50|50} PV par champion touché avec Crachat de feu.

Col\u00e9rique.card_desc: [Salve] Salve se recharge {scale=0.25|0.25}s plus vite par ennemi touché.

Combustible.card_desc: [Crachat de feu] Crachat de feu repousse et inflige 300 dégâts supplémentaires en 2s.

Condescendance.card_desc: [Crachat de feu] Le temps de recharge de Poussée est réduit de {scale=1|1}s par champion touché par Crachat de feu.

D\u00e9vastation.card_desc: [Salve] Le rayon d'explosion des projectiles de Salve augmente de {scale=15|15}%.

Fusillade.card_desc: [Arme] Les tirs directs de Lance-roquettes et de Salve infligent 25% de dégâts supplémentaires.

Hyper catalyseur.card_desc: [Salve] Vous récupérez {scale=3|3}% de votre carburant chaque fois que Salve touche une cible.

Joie de la chasse.card_desc: [Poussée] Chaque exécution réduit le temps de recharge de Poussée de {scale=15|15}%.

Magistral.card_desc: [Crachat de feu] Crachat de feu se recharge {scale=0.5|0.5}s plus vite par champion touché.

Permutation.card_desc: [Arme] Vos attaques de base réussies augmentent votre vitesse de rechargement de {scale=10|10}% pendant 3s.

Pluie de feu.card_desc: [Poussée] Pendant 5s après l'activation de Poussée, vous consommez {scale=10|10}% de carburant en moins.

Propulsion.card_desc: [Poussée] La distance horizontale de Poussée augmente de {scale=25|25}%.

R\u00e9servoir.card_desc: [Armure] Votre catalyseur possède {scale=10|10}% de carburant en plus.

Savourer la proie.card_desc: [Salve] Vous récupérez {scale=25|25} PV chaque fois qu'un tir de Salve touche une cible.

Survie.card_desc: [Poussée] Passer en dessous de {scale=10|10}% de PV réinitialise le temps de recharge de Poussée.

\u55b7\u5410\u4e13\u7cbe.card_desc: [火焰喷吐] 每命中一个敌人英雄，火焰喷吐的冷却时间都将减少{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u55b7\u706b\u8005.card_desc: [齐射] 每有一发火箭命中目标，齐射的冷却时间就会降低{scale=0.25|0.25}秒

\u56de\u6696.card_desc: [齐射] 齐射每击中一个目标都能使你回复{scale=25|25}点生命

\u5927\u53f7\u706b\u7bad.card_desc: [武器] 直接命中的攻击会造成35%额外伤害

\u5c16\u7aef\u730e\u98df\u8005.card_desc: [护甲] 获得{scale=14|14}%控制抗性和减速抗性

\u5c45\u9ad8\u4e34\u4e0b.card_desc: [火焰喷吐] 火焰喷吐命中一个敌人，减少推进的冷却时间{scale=1|1}秒

\u5c60\u622e.card_desc: [齐射] 齐射对护盾的伤害提高{scale=10|10}%

\u63a8\u529b\u5f3a\u5316.card_desc: [喷射飞行] 增加喷射飞行的前冲距离{scale=25|25}%

\u6613\u71c3\u9f99\u6d8e.card_desc: [火焰喷吐] 火焰喷吐现在会造成击退效果，且会在2秒内造成30%的额外持续性伤害

\u6c14\u5473\u8ffd\u8e2a.card_desc: [火焰喷吐] 被火焰喷吐命中的敌人，3秒内获得的治疗效果减少{scale=15|15}%

\u706b\u7130\u4e4b\u96e8.card_desc: [喷射飞行] 技能激活后的5秒内，助推器能量消耗减少{scale=10|10}%

\u71c3\u6599\u7bb1.card_desc: [护甲] 增加推进器的能量最大值{scale=10|10}%

\u72e9\u730e\u6b32\u671b.card_desc: [喷射飞行] 击败敌人将使喷射飞行的冷却时间减少{scale=15|15}%

\u751f\u5b58\u672c\u80fd.card_desc: [喷射飞行] 当你的生命值低于{scale=10|10}%时，喷射飞行的冷却时间减少100%

\u7a7a\u4e2d\u5236\u9738.card_desc: [护甲] 击败敌人或助攻时，回复{scale=20|20}%的推进器能量

\u8d81\u70ed\u6362\u5f39.card_desc: [武器] 普通攻击造成伤害将提高你的换弹速度{scale=10|10}%持续3秒

\u8d85\u5927\u80ba\u6d3b\u91cf.card_desc: [火焰喷吐] 火焰喷吐每命中一个敌方英雄都将为你回复{scale=50|50}点生命值

\u8d85\u7ea7\u7a81\u8fdb.card_desc: [齐射] 齐射每命中一个敌人,推进器燃料回复{scale=3|3}%

\u9b54\u9f99\u98de\u884c\u5668.card_desc: [护甲] 喷射器的飞行速度提高40%

Bask.card_desc: [Booster] Using Booster while out of combat will heal you for {100} health per second

Decimate.card_desc: [Loogie] Increase the knockback of your Loogie's explosion by {20}%

Expectorate.card_desc: [Loogie] Increase the projectile speed of loogie by {50}%

Follow the Scent.card_desc: [Fire Spit] Fire Spit reveals enemies for {1}s when it hits them directly.

Hot Swap.card_desc: [Weapon] Dealing damage with your in-hand attacks increases your reload speed by {10}% for 3s.

Hyper Boost.card_desc: [Dragon Punch] Increase the flight time of Dragon Punch by 15%.

Masterful.card_desc: [Weapon] Each consecutive hit against a target increases your damage by 1% of their max HP for 3s, stacking up to 3 times. All stacks lost on a missed shot

Propel.card_desc: [Thrust] Increased the forward distance of Thrust by {25}%

Rain of Fire.card_desc: [Ability] Gain {5}% increased damage for 5s after using Thrust

Spitfire.card_desc: [Salvo] Increase the rocket accuracy of salvo by {4}%

Survival.card_desc: [Armor] Dropping below 30% hp reduces thrusts cooldown by 100% and gives you {15}% move speed for 3s. 30s cooldown

Thrill of the Hunt.card_desc: [Thrust] Killing blows reduce the cooldown of Thrust by {25}%

Viscosity.card_desc: [Loogie] Enemies hit with your loogie directly, or by it's explosion, are slowed by {15}% for 3s

W.Y.R.M. Jets.card_desc: [Thrust] Increase your air movement speed while using booster by {12}%

Adrenalina del cazador.card_desc: [Despegue] Se reduce la recarga de Despegue un {scale=15|15}% al asestar un golpe de gracia.

Altitud.card_desc: [Armadura] Los golpes de gracias y las eliminaciones te hacen recuperar un {scale=20|20}% del máximo de combustible del propulsor.

Anuencia.card_desc: [Gargajo ígneo] Se reduce la recarga de Empellón en {scale=1|1}s por cada campeón enemigo que alcanzas con Gargajo ígneo.

Capacidad pulmonar.card_desc: [Gargajo ígneo] Te curas {scale=50|50} PS por cada campeón enemigo que alcances con Gargajo ígneo.

Combustible.card_desc: [Gargajo ígneo] Gargajo ígneo ahora repele e inflige 300 PS de daño adicional de su daño durante 2s.

Dep\u00f3sito de combustible.card_desc: [Armadura] La capacidad de combustible del propulsor aumenta un {scale=10|10}%.

Diezmar.card_desc: [Quemarropa] El radio de explosión de Quemarropa aumenta un {scale=15|15}%.

Escupefuego.card_desc: [Quemarropa] Se reduce la recarga de Quemarropa en {scale=0.25|0.25}s cada vez que alcanzas a un enemigo con los cohetes de Quemarropa.

Experto.card_desc: [Gargajo ígneo] La recarga de Gargajo ígneo se reduce en {scale=0.5|0.5}s por cada enemigo que alcanzas con el gargajo.

Hiperaumento.card_desc: [Quemarropa] Recuperas un {scale=3|3}% del combustible del propulsor cada vez que Quemarropa golpea a un enemigo.

Intercambio.card_desc: [Arma] Tu velocidad de recarga aumenta un {scale=10|10}% durante 3s tras alcanzar a un enemigo con tu arma.

Jets W.Y.R.M..card_desc: La velocidad de vuelo del Potenciador aumenta.

Lluvia flagrante.card_desc: [Despegue] El propulsor consume un {scale=10|10}% menos de combustible durante 5s tras usar Despegue.

Propulsi\u00f3n.card_desc: [Despegue] La distancia de avance de Despegue aumenta un {scale=25|25}%.

Rastro de olor.card_desc: [Gargajo ígneo] El tamaño de Gargajo ígneo aumenta un {scale=20|20}%.

Recreo.card_desc: [Quemarropa] Te curas {scale=25|25} PS por cada enemigo que alcances con los cohetes de Quemarropa.

Superpredador.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud máxima aumenta en {scale=50|50} PS.

Supervivencia.card_desc: [Despegue] Se reduce la recarga de Despegue un 100% si tu salud máxima baja al {scale=10|10}% o menos.

Tiroteo.card_desc: [Arma] El daño infligido al alcanzar a un enemigo directamente con Lanzamisiles o Quemarropa aumenta un 25%.

Altitude.card_desc: [Armadura] Restaura {scale=20|20}% do combustível máximo do jato ao conseguir uma eliminação ou assistência.

Chuva de Fogo.card_desc: [Impulso] Consome {scale=10|10}% menos combustível do jato por 5s após usar Impulso.

Comemora\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Salva de Mísseis] Você se cura em {scale=25|25} de vida a cada inimigo atingido pela Salva de Mísseis.

Condescend\u00eancia.card_desc: [Cospe-Fogo] Reduz o intervalo do Impulso em {scale=1|1}s a cada Campeão atingido pelo Cospe-Fogo.

Dizimar.card_desc: [Salva de Mísseis] Aumenta o raio da explosão da Salva de Mísseis em {scale=15|15}%.

Emo\u00e7\u00e3o da Ca\u00e7ada.card_desc: [Impulso] Reduz o intervalo do Impulso em {scale=15|15}% ao dar o disparo fatal no inimigo.

Fuzilamento.card_desc: [Arma] O dano causado ao atingir os inimigos com disparos diretos do Lança-foguetes ou da Salva de Mísseis é aumentado em 25%.

Hiper Aumento.card_desc: [Salva de Mísseis] Repõe {scale=3|3}% do combustível do Impulso a cada vez que Salva de Mísseis atinge um inimigo.

Inflam\u00e1vel.card_desc: [Cospe-Fogo] Cospe-Fogo causa repulsão e 300 de dano adicional no decorrer de 2s.

Jatos W.Y.R.M..card_desc: [Impulso] Aumenta sua velocidade de movimento enquanto está usando Impulso.

Maestria.card_desc: [Cospe-fogo] Reduz o intervalo do Cospe-fogo em {scale=0.5|0.5}s para cada inimigo atingido por ele.

Mais Combust\u00edvel.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a capacidade de combustível do jato em {scale=10|10}%.

Massacre de M\u00edsseis.card_desc: [Salva de Mísseis] Reduz o intervalo da Salva de Mísseis em {scale=0.25|0.25}s a cada vez que os míseeis da Salva atingem um inimigo.

Parceria Quente.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta em {scale=10|10}% a velocidade para recarregar a arma por 3s após atingir um inimigo com sua arma.

Poderoso Pulm\u00e3o.card_desc: [Cospe-fogo] Você se cura em {scale=50|50} de vida para cada Campeão atingido com o Cospe-Fogo.

Predador Supremo.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a sua vida máxima em {scale=50|50}.

Propelir.card_desc: [Impulso] Aumenta a distância percorrida pelo Impulso em {scale=25|25}%.

Siga o Faro.card_desc: [Cospe-fogo] Aumenta o tamanho do Cospe-fogo em {scale=20|20}%.

Sobreviv\u00eancia.card_desc: [Impulso] Reduz em 100% o intervalo do Impulso ao chegar abaixo de {scale=10|10}% de vida.

\u0412\u044b\u0436\u0438\u0432\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Взлет] При уровне здоровья ниже {scale=10|10}% перезарядка Взлета сокращается на 100%.

\u0412\u044b\u0441\u043e\u0442\u0430.card_desc: [Броня] Нанесение смертельного удара и устранение восстанавливают {scale=20|20}% от максимального запаса топлива.

\u0412\u044b\u0441\u0448\u0438\u0439 \u0.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье повышается на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u0413\u0438\u043f\u0435\u0440\u0443\u04.card_desc: [Очередь] Каждое попадание по цели Очередью восстанавливает {scale=3|3}% вашего топлива.

\u0413\u043e\u0440\u044e\u0447\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Огненный плевок] Огненный плевок отбрасывает врагов и наносит 300 ед. бонусного урона в течение 2 с.

\u0413\u043e\u0440\u044f\u0447\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Попадание в цель повышает скорость перезарядки на {scale=10|10}% на 3 с.

\u0417.\u041c.\u0415.\u0419. \u0421\u043.card_desc: [Ускоритель] При использовании Ускорителя ваша скорость передвижения повышается.

\u0418\u0434\u0438 \u043f\u043e \u0437\u.card_desc: [Огненный плевок] Размер снарядов Огненного плевка увеличивается на {scale=20|20}%.

\u041c\u0430\u0441\u0442\u0435\u0440\u04.card_desc: [Огненный плевок] Каждое попадание по вражескому чемпиону Огненным плевком сокращает его перезарядку на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u041e\u0431\u044a\u0435\u043c \u043b\u0.card_desc: [Огненный плевок] Каждое попадание по вражескому чемпиону Огненным плевком исцеляет вас на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u041e\u0433\u043d\u0435\u043d\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Очередь] Каждый раз, когда Очередь поражает врагов ракетами, ее время перезарядки сокращается на {scale=0.25|0.25} с.
[Взлет] После использования Взлета Ускоритель потребляет на {scale=10|10}% меньше топлива в течение 5 с.

\u041e\u0445\u043e\u0442\u043d\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Взлет] Смертельные удары сокращают перезарядку Взлета на {scale=15|15}%.

\u0420\u0430\u0441\u0441\u0442\u0440\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Урон от прямого попадания по врагу Ракетницей или Очередью повышается на 25%.

\u0421\u043d\u0438\u0441\u0445\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Огненный плевок] Каждое попадание по вражескому чемпиону Огненным плевком ускоряет восстановление Взлета на {scale=1|1} с.

\u0421\u043e\u0433\u0440\u0435\u0432\u04.card_desc: [Очередь] Каждое попадание по врагу ракетами Очереди исцеляет вас на {scale=25|25} ед.

Bak.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa rezerwę paliwa w Dopalaczu o {scale=10|10}%.

Deszcz ognia.card_desc: [Odbicie] Przez 5 s po użyciu Odbicia dopalacz zużywa o {scale=10|10}% mniej paliwa.

Drapie\u017cnik alfa.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoje maks. zdrowie o {scale=50|50} PZ.

Id\u017a za w\u0119chem.card_desc: [Plucie ogniem] Zwiększa rozmiar pocisku Plucia ogniem o {scale=20|20}%.

\u0141askawo\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Plucie ogniem] Każde trafienie wrogiego czempiona Pluciem ognia skraca czas odnowienia Odbicia o {scale=1|1} s.

Mistrzostwo.card_desc: [Plucie ogniem] Skraca czas odnowienia Plucia ogniem o {scale=0.5|0.5} s za każde trafienie nim czempiona.

Ogrzanie.card_desc: [Salwa] Przywraca {scale=25|25} PZ za każdego wroga trafionego rakietami Salwy.

Plucie ogniem.card_desc: [Salwa] Skraca czas odnowienia Salwy o {scale=0.25|0.25} s za każde trafienie wroga rakietą Salwy.

Pojemno\u015b\u0107 p\u0142uc.card_desc: [Plucie ogniem] Każde trafienie wrogiego czempiona Pluciem ognia przywraca {scale=50|50} PZ.

Przetrwanie.card_desc: [Odbicie] Skraca czas odnowienia Odbicia o 100%, jeśli twój poziom zdrowia nie przekracza {scale=10|10}% PZ.

Rakiety S.M.O.K..card_desc: [Dopalacz] Zwiększa twoją szybkość ruchu podczas korzystania z Dopalacza.

Strzelanina.card_desc: [Broń] Obrażenia zadawane wrogom trafionym bezpośrednio Wyrzutnią rakiet lub Salwą są zwiększone o 25%.

Superdopalacz.card_desc: [Salwa] Przywraca {scale=3|3}% paliwa Dopalacza za każde trafienie celu Salwą.

Szale\u0144stwo \u0142ow\u00f3w.card_desc: [Odbicie] Skraca czas odnowienia Odbicia o {scale=15|15}%, kiedy zadajesz Zabójczy cios.

Szybka zmiana.card_desc: [Broń] Trafienie wroga bronią zwiększa szybkość przeładowania o {scale=10|10}% na 3 s.

Wysoko\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Pancerz] Przywraca {scale=20|20}% maks. paliwa w dopalaczu za każdy Zabójczy cios lub eliminację.

Zap\u0142on.card_desc: [Plucie ogniem] Plucie ogniem odrzuca cele i zadaje dodatkowo 300 obrażeń przez 2 s.

Ate\u015f P\u00fcsk\u00fcrtme.card_desc: [Yaylım Ateşi] Yaylım Ateşi roketleri ile düşmana her vuruşta Yaylım Ateşi'nin Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.25|0.25}sn azalt.

Ate\u015f Ya\u011fmuru.card_desc: [İtiş] İtiş'i kullandıktan sonraki 5sn boyunca, İtici %{scale=10|10} daha az yakıt kullanır.

Av Heyecan\u0131.card_desc: [İtiş] Bir Öldürücü Darbe indirdiğinde İtiş'in Bekleme Süresi %{scale=15|15} azalır.

Ci\u011fer Kapasitesi.card_desc: [Ateş Tükürüğü] Ateş Tükürüğü ile vurduğun her düşman Şampiyon için {scale=50|50} Can iyileş.

Hayatta Kalma.card_desc: [İtiş] %{scale=10|10} Can veya altına düştüğünde İtiş'in Bekleme Süresi %100 azalır.

Hiper G\u00fc\u00e7lendirme.card_desc: [Yaylım Ateşi] Yaylım Ateşi bir hedefi her vurduğunda İtici Yakıtı %{scale=3|3} dolar.

H\u0131zl\u0131 De\u011fi\u015fim.card_desc: [Silah] Silahınla bir düşmanı vurduktan sonra Yeniden Doldurma Hızını 3 sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} artır.

\u0130rtifa.card_desc: [Zırh] Öldürücü Darbe veya Saf Dışı Bırakma yaptığında maksimum İtici Yakıtının %{scale=20|20} kadarını yenile.

Is\u0131nma.card_desc: [Yaylım Ateşi] Yaylım Ateşi roketleri ile vurduğun her düşman için {scale=25|25} Can iyileş.

Katliam.card_desc: [Yaylım Ateşi] Yaylım Ateşi patlamalarının etki alanını %{scale=15|15} artır.

Tam \u0130sabet.card_desc: [Silah] Roketatar veya Yaylım Ateşi ile ile doğrudan bir düşmana vuruşta hasar %25 artar.

Tenezz\u00fcl.card_desc: [Ateş Tükürüğü] Ateş Tükürüğü ile vurulan her düşman Şampiyon için İtiş'in Bekleme Süresini {scale=1|1}sn azalt.

Ustaca.card_desc: [Ateş Tükürüğü] Ateş Tükürüğü ile vurulan her düşman şampiyonu için Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.5|0.5}sn azalt.

Yan\u0131c\u0131.card_desc: [Ateş Tükürüğü] Ateş Tükürüğü Geri İter ve 2 saniyede ek 300 hasar verir.
